Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I'm fairly new to KSP, I've played around with vanilla for a while now and wanted to try and see how much better I could do after adding some mods, soI thought I'd get out into the community and see whats going on! After lurking around for a while, I can't wait to jump in, seems like a good bunch!

I am excited to see what mods are worth getting, and if anyone knows of any easy ways of managing them, so please say hello and offer any advice you have.

Thanks Guys and Gals.

Hi, DanLarn and welcom to the forums!

On curse.com you can see wich mods have been most downloaded:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal?filter-project-sort=5

You can also look in the mod section of this forum.

Many of the popular mods are on the first page.

The mods I'm using are:

Ferram Aerospace

Interstellar mod (Part mod)

B9 Aerospace (Part mod)

KW Rocketry (Part mod)

MechJeb

Mods that add parts can make the game run out of memory, so try adding one mod at a time and look in the task manager. (The limit for 32-bit KSP is 3.2GB RAM).

64-bit doesn't have this limitation but it can be buggy.

Greetings! Another nice place to find mods is [Defunct link removed by a moderator].

Edited August 28, 2022 by James Kerman
link removed
